body_html:
The same problems happened to me.
My system information:
Windows 7
Visual Studio 2015
Tensorflow v1.3.0-rc2
Python 3.5.2
cmake version 3.6.2
And my cmake setting

In addition the issue occurs in 6 other projects to me:
compare_graph
summarize_graph
transform_graph
benchmark_model
tf_label_image_example
grpc_tensorflow_server

So i apply to same modification to below three cmake files as what rasitsimsek have done to tf_tutorials.cmake

  • tf_tools.cmake
  • tf_core_distributed_runtime.cmake
  • tf_label_image_example.cmake

body:
The same problems happened to me.
My system information:
Windows 7
Visual Studio 2015
Tensorflow v1.3.0-rc2
Python 3.5.2
cmake version 3.6.2
And my cmake setting
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4746227/29161448-dfa05d78-7de8-11e7-9ef8-46e823105891.png)

**In addition the issue occurs in 6 other projects to me**:
compare_graph 
summarize_graph 
transform_graph 
benchmark_model
tf_label_image_example
grpc_tensorflow_server 

**So i apply to same modification** to below three cmake files **as what rasitsimsek have done to tf_tutorials.cmake**
- tf_tools.cmake 
- tf_core_distributed_runtime.cmake 
- tf_label_image_example.cmake
